concept.title: Logging

conbody.p: The recovery manager and the transaction server services produce log files which are located in the services/logs/ directory. There are two log files per service one called <service name>-service.log (e.g. recovery-manager-service.log), which contains information regarding the state of the service (e.g. started, stopped, restarted etc). The other is called <services-name>.log (e.g. recovery-manager.log) this contains information logged from the actual service (e.g. application level logging). To configure what information is logged in these files please edit the appropriate LOG4J configuration files which are located in services/config/.
